about_the_game:
Emotional: Redemption is the fourth musical asset album in the RPG Maker Emotional music pack series composed by Richard John S. Emotional: Redemption consists of compositions that reflect upon sorrow, despair, and a touch of drama. There are both wet (reverb) and dry (little or no reverb) versions to each composition to give developers more options. If you are looking to intensify your emotional scenes, then Emotional: Redemption is an excellent music pack for you!

Features:

* 15 royalty-free songs for use in your games with both wet and dry versions for a total of 30 songs!
* ogg, mp3, wav and m4a formats included
* For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

01 - Angels and Demons
02 - Beginning of the End
03 - Crying in Sorrow
04 - Deliverance
05 - Despair
06 - Follow the Light
07 - Hoping for a Miracle
08 - Redemption
09 - Remorse
10 - Salvation
11 - Shallow Hope
12 - The Rise of Sin
13 - Tragedy
14 - Unforgiven
15 - When This Life Is Over
